title: Dior Is Latest Luxury Brand to Embrace Tokenized Fashion—But Won't Say 'NFT'
description: French fashion house Dior announced a line of men's sneakers with "digital twins" on Ethereum and an NFC chip-based authentication system.

title: Celsius granted court approval to convert altcoins into Bitcoin and Ethereum
description:
Bankrupt crypto lender Celsius Network has been authorized by the bankruptcy court to sell all of its altcoins for Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH), effective tomorrow, July 1, as stated in a June 30 court filing. “[Celsius] may sell or convert any non-BTC and non-ETH cryptocurrency, crypto tokens, or other cryptocurrency assets other than such […]

The post Celsius granted court approval to convert altcoins into Bitcoin and Ethereum appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Bitcoin Cash Hashrate Gains Momentum: Miners Flock to BCH as Profitability Surges
description: Over the past two weeks, bitcoin cash has experienced a significant surge, increasing 182% against the U.S. dollar and attracting more hashrate to its network. Approximately 22 bitcoin cash mining pools are now allocating SHA256 hashrate to the chain as BCH is currently 2.7% more lucrative to mine compared to BTC. Bitcoin Cash Hashrate Sees […]
